Newark.WSNR: WSNR, AM 620, is a radio station in the New York metropolitan area with a brokered time format. The station is co-owned by Gregory Davidzon, a Russian-American media mogul who also publishes a weekly newspaper under his name, and Sam Katsman, through licensee Davidzon Radio, Inc. During part of the weekend, the station airs a Caribbean format, One Caribbean Radio.
